sentence.Network_en: The fielders crouch around the batsman's wicket.
sentence.Network_cn: 防守队员蹲伏在击球手守卫的三柱门周围。

sentence.Network_en: Defending his wicket watchfully, the last man is playing out time.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后一名球员小心地守着他的三柱门, 直到比赛结束.

sentence.Network_en: Buy your tickets at this wicket.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 在板球运动中，三柱门（wicket）可以有多种独特的含义。来自“http://zh.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=三柱门&oldid=25383748”  本 …
窗字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 窗孔〖 orifice〗 窗口〖 window;wicket〗 窗框〖 windowframe〗.
建筑学常见英语词汇 ... 防火门 fire door (大门上的)小门 wicket 门框 door frame.
whizzer blade 风轮叶(泥)wicket 窑门；炉口wicking 聚然吸收能量

list.abs: ...（caught）、用触身出局（lbw）、被击杀（stumped）和被追杀（run out）。比较少见的是打门出局（hit wicket）、二击出局（hit the ball twice）、手球出局（handled the ball）、阻.
sticky wicket 困境_外语教育网 ... ·Roll the dice 碰运气 1. sticky wicket 困境，不利地位 2. in a bind 处于困境.
larry's blog--台湾土木工程词汇五 ... drum washer 鼓型清洗机 drum wicket 鼓形闸 dry air 干空气.
水利工程专业英语 - 河林的日志 - 网易博客 ... stay ring， 座环 wicket gate， 导叶 main shaft， 主轴.
sluice gate 水闸wicket gate 旋闸gauge 规；计；表；样板

lj.lj_ly: the batsman remained at the wicket.
he was &B{caught at the wicket} chasing a wide one.
lj.lj_ls: 他在追击一个投偏球时被守门员接住了。

jx.jx_en_mean: (Cricket)(of a fielding side) have a batsman dismissed
(Cricket)a pitch that has been drying after rain and is difficult to bat on
jx.jx_cn_mean: (板球)（雨后）周围场地泥泞的三柱门

jx.jx_en_mean: (Cricket)(referring to which side of the wicket a bowler runs when bowling) to the left of the wicket if a right-handed bowler and the right of the wicket if a left-handed bowler
jx.jx_cn_mean: (板球)（投球手）朝自己投球使用的手相反方向跑

jx.jx_cn_mean: (板球)（投球手）朝自己投球使用的手一致的方向跑

jx.jx_en_mean: (Cricket)(of a bowler or a fielding side) dismiss a batsman
jx.jx_cn_mean: (板球)（投球手，防守方）使击球员 出局

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'small door or grille'): from Anglo-Norman French and Old Northern French wiket; origin uncertain, usually referred to the Germanic root of Old Norse vīkja 'to turn, move'. Cricket senses date from the late 17th cent

entry.def: In cricket, a wicket is a set of three upright sticks with two small sticks on top of them at which the ball is bowled. There are two wickets on a cricket pitch.

entry.tran: (板球场中)两个三柱门之间的场地
entry.def: In cricket, a wicket is the area of grass in between the two wickets on the pitch.

entry.tran: （板球运动中）击球手击球的一轮，击球手的避免出局
entry.def: In cricket, when a wicket falls or is taken, a batsman is out.

means.word_mean: 1. cricket equipment consisting of a set of three stumps topped by crosspieces; used in playing cricket
2. a small arch used as croquet equipment
3. small gate or door (especially one that is part of a larger door)
4. small opening (like a window in a door) through which business can be transacted
